results.text: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
results.reason: This verse speaks directly to God's personal plans and intentions for each individual, offering reassurance.
results.reflection: Trust in God's plan for your life, as He desires your well-being and a hopeful future.

results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes God's presence with you, providing strength and support.
results.reflection: Rely on God's strength and presence to overcome fear and anxiety.

results.text: I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
results.reason: This verse highlights the empowerment you receive through Christ, enabling you to face challenges.
results.reflection: With Christ's strength, you can tackle any obstacle that comes your way.

results.text: Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
results.reason: Jesus invites you to find rest and relief from burdens in Him, offering peace and comfort.
results.reflection: Seek rest in Jesus when you feel overwhelmed by life's burdens.

results.text: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
results.reason: This verse portrays a personal relationship with God, assuring you of His provision and care.
results.reflection: With God as your shepherd, trust that you have all you need.
